content: this pattern can be found for free on my blog here 1 an ad-free print-friendly pdf is available on etsy here 2 a perfectly sized lovey or travel blanket for a little one i wanted something lightweight and small you know the kind you can take while on-the-go drape over a little one in a carrier or tuck into a diaper bag this is that blanket use an additional cake and work more repeat rounds to make a larger blanket **materials ** * single cake of scheepjes whirl fingering yarn * g 4mm hook **sample blanket dimensions ** 31in 79cm square **skill level ** easy gauge is critical to this pattern as all of the cake was used this pattern is written in standard us crochet terms when you purchase $16 50 worth of patterns enter code esave3 at checkout on etsy for a $3 savings finished items may be sold i just ask that you give credit to me susan carlson at feltedbutton com for the pattern keep in the button loop facebook 3 pinterest 4 feltedbutton com 5 instagram @feltedbutton 1 http //www feltedbutton com/2017/05/caramel-whirl-blanket-free-crochet html 2 https //www etsy com/listing/519154638/crochet-pattern-caramel-whirl-blanket 3 http //facebook com/feltedbutton 4 https //www pinterest com/feltedbutton/pins/ 5 http //www feltedbutton com
